text: hey sorry I didn't get any notification of your message! Damn that's really cool, I imagine it was quite intense working on a redesign. I suppose you just make sure to respect whoever did the original? yeah i'm definitely trying to make the most of the free time but the virus has really put a spanner in the works for my university. I'm in my third year at hertfordshire as creature modeller.
I spoke to someone else from MPC who said that it's usually a separate artist who works on the blend shapes. have you dabbled in them at all?
